Class StatementGroupOptimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openrdf.query.algebra.helpers.QueryModelVisitorBase<OptimizationException>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FedXOptimizer, org.openrdf.query.algebra.QueryModelVisitor<OptimizationException>

    public class StatementGroupOptimizer
extends org.openrdf.query.algebra.helpers.QueryModelVisitorBase<OptimizationException>
implements FedXOptimizer
    Optimizer with the following tasks: 1. Group ExclusiveStatement into ExclusiveGroup 2. Adjust the join order using JoinOrderOptimizer

    as
